sent.orig: Continuous gliding band on a sealed, internal teflon strip is virtually friction free.
sent.trans: Continuous一贯反滑带摩擦密封装置，内部摩擦聚四氟乙烯地带几乎是免费的。

sent.orig: Through dividing the over-long five span continuous beams into span continuous beams and 32.
sent.trans: 通过将超长的五跨连续梁根据跨度的变化分为四跨连续梁和32。

sent.orig: DEV43XA continuous deviation tool is a kind of high precision continuous deviation survey system.
sent.trans: DEV43XA井斜测井仪是一种数字化的高精度连续测斜系统。

sent.orig: Below 4, water is in continuous expansion instead of continuous contraction.
sent.trans: 水在4度以下就不断地膨胀，而不是不断地收缩。

sent.orig: The continuous vacuum belt dryer and the continuous vacuum granulating dryer were introduced in this article.
sent.trans: 简要介绍了中药浸膏干燥用的连续真空带式干燥机和连续真空制粒干燥机。
